### Open-Source Projects
 
* _Tank Battle: Iron Warfare_ - A 3D tank combat action game for iOS.
 [github.com/judnich/IronWarfare](github.com/judnich/IronWarfare)

* _Tuple Markup Language_ - An extremely simple all-purpose markup language.
 [github.com/judnich/TupleMarkup](github.com/judnich/TupleMarkup)

* _PagedGeometry Engine_ - A high performance 3D forest rendering engine.
 [code.google.com/p/ogre-paged/](code.google.com/p/ogre-paged/)

### Publications

* John Judnich and Nam Ling, ["Fast Multiresolution Terrain Rendering With Symmetric Cluster Sets"](http://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=2077415). ACM SIGGRAPH Asia Proceedings, December 2011.

* John Judnich and Nam Ling, ["Symmetric Cluster Set Level of Detail for Real-Time Terrain Rendering"](http://www.icme2012.org/download/Final.pdf). IEEE International Conference on Multimedia and Expo, July 2012.

### Research
 
Working in 3D rendering algorithm research, developing algorithms to improve performance for high quality visualization of large scale scenes. Aiming to enable photorealistic 3D graphics scalable to galactic scope - capable of visualizing billions of galaxies, stars, planets, etc. explorable down to ground level.

### Experience

* _Microsoft_ - Software Development Engineer Intern (2012) -
 Xbox Engineering Fundamentals Team

* _NVIDIA Corporation_ - Software Engineer Intern (2011) -
 OpenGL Core Team

* _Santa Clara University_ - Research Assistant (2011+) -
  *3D Rendering Algorithm Research

* _Santa Clara University_ - Teaching Assistant (2010-2011) -
  *Computer Engineering Labs

* _Wendigo Studios_ - Software Engineer (2009) -
 3D Engine Lead - Sonar Visualization Systems R&D

* _Sonora Engineering_ - Embedded Systems Software Engineer (2002-2009) -
 Semiconductor fabrication controllers and medical monitoring equipment

### Education

BS in Computer Science and Engineering, Santa Clara University, Class of 2013
